title: Please Alter ARAM Queues By Blocklist
body:
I see these same douchebags time and again. The team is all ruffled and talking about someone on the team being a dick,  then I realise I HAVE THEM BLOCKED ALREADY. They cause the whole team strife on a regular basis.
I don't want to be teamed up with players I already have issues with, put them on the opposing team for sure, but don't team me up with players I have blocked because they are salty, abusive children.

Now, I'm not saying I'm always 'nice', but I never start it. I don't abuse players on my team that are failing, I offer advice. I only ever abuse (on rare occasions), in response to abuse.

It's funny, I tend to notice that whenever I'm teamed with someone already on my blocklist, they cause troubles within our team. I don't notice due to them being blocked already, but it's the same salty, negative douchbags that I already have blocked, that piss off the other teammates. Report system seems inconsequential, dicks will be dicks all the time without punishment.
